son32java.son32reader

Class Son32Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • son32java.son32reader.Son32Reader

  • public class Son32Reader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will contain an instance of the Son32JavaInterface, which contains all the son32.dll functions in abstract form. The interface maps the function signature to the actual implementation in the C code. One of the reasons, why this class exists is to detect errros. The C functions just return int error codes. In this class the methodes will check for this error codes and throw the corresponding java exceptions.

      • SONGetRealData

        public void SONGetRealData(short chan,
                           long max,
                           long sTime,
                           long eTime,
                           double[] target)
                    throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        This function reads contiguous waveform data from the given channel between two set times.
        Parameters:
        chan - The channel number (counting starts with 0).
        max - The maximum number of data point to be returned
        sTime - The strat time in clock ticks.
        eTime - The end time in clock ticks.
        target - The target array for the data
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
